endpoints.description: Retrieve the estimated value of a property by providing location and features.
Submit detailed property information to be stored and analyzed.
Get market trends for a specific location, including price movement.
Fetch a list of features commonly seen in properties within a given area.
Access historical valuation data of a property.
Update the details of an existing property record in the service database.
Retrieve a list of noteworthy real estate investment trusts and their performance.
Identify similar properties based on input property details.
Delete a previously entered property record from the database.
Get a detailed comparison of two or more properties based on given attributes.
